message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
That's a good starting point, Alice, but I'm only willing to go up to $80 for this product. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to save a few bucks. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $85. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
